Accelerated Company: UXPin

UXPin provides digital and analog design tools that help teams focus on User Experience and achieve great design in a collaborative way. From paper prototyping, through drawing design ideas, to final presentation in front of a client. UXPin is the UX Design Toolkit for any team that cares about great User Experience Design.
